content: you don t have to be human to enjoy the christmas season and the same goes for christmas stockings this pattern is designed especially for those furry family members you love so dearly and created at the perfect size for a bone chew toy or whatever other little gift your four-legged friend desires this holiday season because everyone in the home deserves a handmade stocking filled with love in this pattern you will find instructions on kitchener stitch the afterthought heel fair isle knitting and knitting in the round you will also find 15 color charts as follows large breed dog small breed dog scottie/yorkie small dog puppy/misc three cat charts large bone small bone large paw print small paw print mice as well as 4 patterns for the foot of your stocking ------------ approximate measurements cuff to toe--13 inches circumfrence--6 1/2 inches skill level intermediate materials needed worsted weight yarn size 7 16 circular needle size 7 dpns or 32 circular for magic loop method pattern notes to purchase an alphabet and add names to the top of your stocking visit https //www etsy com/listing/245902200/rustic-christmas-stocking-alphabet-chart ref=shop_home_active_2
